name: loutishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a very rude, offensive, and sometimes violent way: A large group of boys ran loutishly towards him. Men who behave loutishly are not nice to have around, and they should be thrown out of the bar for bad behaviour.
More examplesFewer examplesThey may not actively go around looking for fights, but they drink too much, behave loutishly, and are sometimes violent.He sings football songs as loutishly as the others, but his sense of duty stops him from fighting.Behaving loutishly is just attention-seeking behaviour.
